gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Celtics 124, Trail Blazers 107
gameRecap.excerpt: The Celtics defeated the Trail Blazers, 124-107. Jaylen Brown put up 26 points (10-17 FG) and four rebounds for the Celtics, while Payton Pritchard added 20 points and eight assists in the victory. Dalano Banton led all scorers with 28 points, along with nine assists for the Trail Blazers in the losing effort. The Celtics win their fifth straight game as they improve to 62-16 on the season, while the Trail Blazers fall to 21-57.
